attributes.action: Stop all bank overdraft charges and fees during Corona virus
attributes.additional_details: Prevent people facing financial hardship during a very difficult time
attributes.background: Stop all bank charges and fees including Interest during Corona virus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305297

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
